title: Chapter 935 - Fragments Of The Grand Dao
volume_title: A Sword Cleaves A Path Through The Netherworld
body:
Chapter 935 - Fragments Of The Grand Dao

The sounds of slaughter shook the heavens throughout the darkened landscape.

From time to time, demons exploded and fell from the sky like meteors.

In the forbidden grounds of the City of the Wrongfully Dead, the White Bone Emperor, Divine Monarch Falling Star, and the others were top-notch existences, like local hegemons.

Their strength was monstrous, and their vicious majesty was without limit. Even the Nine Serenities Netherworld Crow dared not provoke them lightly.

When they joined forces, slaying the demons of the seventh layer of purgatory naturally wasnâ€™t difficult.

After all, this was only the seventh of the Nine Great Purgatories of the Dark Capital. Although the demons here were strong, they were far from comparable to those of the eighth and ninth layers.

The ninth layer in particular was seen as a forbidden ground for Emperors!

Throughout its longhistory, supremely powerful Imperial Realm experts had occasionally explored it, but practically nonereturned alive.

The battle currently raging on the seventh layer changed the moment the White Bone Emperor and the other terrifying entities appeared. The mass of demons...
original_title: Chapter 935 - Fragments of the Grand Dao
